snippet: Cleveland hired John DeFilippo to direct its offense, Jacksonville added Greg Olson in the same role, and Chicago selected Adam Gase as its coordinator.
abstract: NFL Roundup: Jackson Jaguars hire offensive coordinator Greg Olson and Cleveland Browns hire John DeFilippo as their offensive coordinators; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Cleveland hired John DeFilippo to direct its offense, Jacksonville added Greg Olson in the same role, and Chicago selected Adam Gase as its coordinator.
